meanings.definition: Resembling or having the form of a tube.
meanings.sent1: The tubelike plant stems were long and slender.
meanings.sent2: The straw had a tubelike shape for drinking.
meanings.sent3: The tubelike slide at the park was so twisty!
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the hallway like a tubelike tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The tubelike clouds stretched across the sky, resembling giant pipes.

meanings.definition: Having a shape or structure similar to a tube.
meanings.sent1: The tubelike pasta was perfect for holding sauce.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a tubelike body as it crawled.
meanings.sent3: The tubelike balloon animal popped with a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: His tubelike telescope helped him see the stars clearly.
meanings.sent5: The tubelike tunnel led us deep into the mountain, like a secret passage.
